message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe I can only pay $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value it holds for you.
